level.heading: Definition; confidentiality requirements.
level.text: ยง8-1101. Definition; confidentiality requirements. a. For purposes of this chapter, the term "chancellor" shall mean the chancellor of the city school district of the city of New York, or the chancellor's designee. b. In no event shall any report submitted pursuant to this chapter release, or provide access to, any personally identifiable information contained in education records in violation of 20 U.S.C. ยง 1232g or information in violation of any other applicable confidentiality requirement in federal or state law.
